sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import Hamburger from '../../assets/Hamburger/Hamburger' import showControl from '../../assets/showControl/showControl' import Container from '../Container/Container' import LoginMenu from '../LoginMenu/LoginMenu' import Navbar from '../Navbar/Navbar' import NavbarContainer from '../Navbar/NavbarContainer' import user from '../../images/user.png' import { FaUser, FaShoppingCart } from "react-icons/fa"; import LoginMenuContainer from '../LoginMenu/LoginMenuContainer' type TProps = { setIsNavbarOpen: (isNavbarOpen: boolean) => void isNavbarOpen: boolean logoText: string isLoginMenuOpen: boolean setIsLoginMenuOpen: (isLoginMenuOpen: boolean) => void isCartMenuOpen: boolean setIsCartMenuOpen: (isCartMenuOpen: boolean) => void } const Header: React.FC = React.memo(( {setIsNavbarOpen, isNavbarOpen, logoText, isLoginMenuOpen, setIsLoginMenuOpen, isCartMenuOpen, setIsCartMenuOpen }) => { const toggleLoginMenu = () => { setIsLoginMenuOpen(!isLoginMenuOpen) } const toggleCartMenu = () => { setIsCartMenuOpen(!isCartMenuOpen) } return (
{logoText}
{showControl((
), isLoginMenuOpen)} {showControl((
), isNavbarOpen)}
) }) export default Header
